data_processing.title: 1. Data Processing
data_processing.content: Your privacy is important to us. Code Digger processes cookie data locally on your device. We do not collect, store, or transmit your personal data or cookie information to our servers. Any data you export remains on your device and is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

data_collection.title: 2. Data Collection
data_collection.content: We do not collect any personal information from users. The extension operates entirely locally. We may collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our product, but this data cannot be used to identify individual users.

payment_security.title: 3. Payment Security
payment_security.content: Payments are processed securely through Paddle. Your payment information is never stored on our servers. Subscriptions can be canceled at any time through your Paddle account dashboard.

refund_eligibility.title: 1. Refund Eligibility
refund_eligibility.content: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid subscriptions. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us within 14 days of payment to request a refund. Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days. No refunds will be given for subscriptions older than 14 days or for accounts that have violated our terms of service.

how_to_request.title: 2. How to Request a Refund
how_to_request.content: To request a refund, please contact our support team through the extension's support channel or email us at whoiszsm@qq.com. Include your purchase information and reason for the refund request.

refund_processing.title: 3. Refund Processing
refund_processing.content: Once your refund request is approved, the refund will be processed through Paddle to your original payment method. Processing time may vary depending on your payment provider.

exceptions.title: 4. Exceptions
exceptions.content: Refunds will not be provided in the following circumstances:
exceptions.items_html:
• Subscription is older than 14 days from the date of purchase
  • User has violated the terms of service
  • User has requested chargeback through their payment provider
  • Subscription was gifted or transferred to another account
